formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Langmuir Isotherm: \( q_e = \frac{Q_{\text{max}}bC_e}{1 + bC_e} \) Freundlich Isotherm: \( q_e = K_fC_e^{1/n} \)
